name: Spot Girls Difference
short_description: Spot Girls Difference is a game to find different things. Come on, find different things among all kinds of beautiful women. Every level will have a new beauty, and different places may be in any location of the beauty.

name: Space Journey
short_description: Space Journey is a first-person space simulator. You will explore 6 levels: Asteroid Belt, Supernova, Orion, Infinite Space, Nebula and Dark Void.

name: Adventure in Kana Village-中文学习资料
short_description: Learning materials for players who use Chinese

name: Adventure in Kana Village-English Learning materials
short_description: Learning materials for players who use English

name: Adventure in Kana Village-ArtBook
short_description: Artbook: some wallpapers

name: Ancient Anathema
short_description: Resolva o mistério do desaparecimento do dono do cemitério. E não se esqueça de onde você tem que viver uma longa noite.

name: Here I Come
short_description: Stay alive in a deadly reality show.

name: Train Manager
short_description: Trains need to enter the station and leave. On their way there it would be kinda good that none of them crash. Crashes are bad and should be avoided. The passengers are probably not that happy if that happens. Make sure it won't happen and everything is good.

name: The Princess, the Stray Cat, and Matters of the Heart
short_description: Once upon a time, after his mother passed away, a boy called Nora felt all alone in the world. He spent every day with his unique and kind hearted friends until one fateful day, he had a chance encounter with a princess from the Netherworld.

name: T.A.P.
short_description: Tower defense is not! Tower Attack! Turret Attacking Platform. Build towers on a rolling ship, improve them, strengthen, build factories, extract resources, Swing skills, earn reputation. You will have 70 types of turrets, 70 skills, 8 active abilities, 5 types of ships. Try a more advanced version of tower defense.

name: GACHIMUCHI REBIRTH
short_description: Lost memory "You got me mad now.", got into another world "That's not good, man.", doesn't understand what the fuck is going on "Like embarrassing me, huh?!", Doesn't remember his past. What could be better "Woo!"?!

name: Tactics V: "Obsidian Brigade" - Soundtrack
short_description: Original soundtrack for Tactics V: "Obsidian Brigade"

name: The Pack
short_description: The story of two people who have dedicated their lives to law enforcement. One, a former police officer, instructs less experienced comrades and makes a feasible contribution to the fight against crime, although he doesn't always keep up with the law.

name: [Grand Prototype]
short_description: Drive races and build your own vehicle. Find your racetrack on one of many maps. Try it out if you feel like it and beat your best time. But the game is not yet finished, from time to time it will expand and offer even more options.

name: Scrapyard Robot Rampage
short_description: Fight for the survival in a stylized world, where death is the only guarantee.

name: Wings of Glass 玻璃の羽
short_description: Mayfly, a girl with glass wings, is kidnapped by Ferace, a giant demon. Ferace rips off the wings that define her, but loses Mayfly to a cave. She is weak and scared. Dangers lie before and ahead of her. Be careful, stealthy, and smart to survive. She'll need to find her wings to get home.

name: Barony: Myths & Outcasts
short_description: Adventure through the Barony dungeons as the evil monster races and all new classes, providing dozens of new gameplay combinations. Or play with a monster skin, just for fun! Play with others whether or not they own this DLC.

name: Barony: Legends & Pariahs
short_description: The second Barony DLC featuring even more monster races and all new classes, providing a huge number of gameplay possibilities. You can play with a monster skin just for fun, and play with others whether or not they own any Barony DLC.

name: Mech Chip
short_description: Mech Chip is an action-adventure platformer with pilotable machinery. Explore the internal labyrinth of the cybersphere, and install yourself into devices to gain new quirks and abilities.

name: VR Party Pack
short_description: It's finally here! A social virtual reality game designed for parties! Cup pong, basketball, baseball, bowling, climbing, ping pong + so many more all in one bundle!

name: 東方翠神廻廊 〜 Faith in the Goddess of Suwa.
short_description: “Touhou Suijin Kairou” is a Touhou derivative RPG featuring over 150 fantasy girls! Explore the corridors and solve the strange situation in Gensokyo! A profound story unfolds, and your choices will change the future!

name: Hide and Seek
short_description: It is a very funny, fast and easy game which can be played by adults as well as children. This game has two teams that try to prevent each other from winning.

name: Touhou Fantasia / 东方梦想曲
short_description: This is a fan-made Touhou shmup with one single stage, similar to the extra stage of official Touhou games. This game has an auto dodging system, which gives you a choice to ignore all the danmaku and only focus on the story.

name: Aztec Tower
short_description: Aztec Tower is a free VR bow & arrow game about defending the temple of your people against the spanish conquistadors.

name: Zeliria Sanctuary - OST + ARTBOOK
short_description: OST for Zeliria Sanctuary visual novel

name: SmartyTale 2D
short_description: Fascinating, full of mysteries, an adventure with a storyline unfolded in the style of good old games with Retro Consoles!

name: Dead Wishes
short_description: In this chaotic world, you must adapt - either to forgive or survive. A thriller-romance indie visual novel/dating simulator.

name: Infinite Art Museum
short_description: The Infinite Art Museum is a free, permanent virtual reality museum and archive of art. Explore a growing collection of over 800 original paintings, illustrations, digital art and photographs from artists around the world.

name: Hero-U: Rogue to Redemption - Soundtrack
short_description: Listen to the official soundtrack for Hero-U: Rogue to Redemption! Composed by Ryan Grogan, this album features music used in the design process and the final game.

name: HENTAI MINESWEEPER
short_description: Legendary game "minesweeper" in a unique performance and atmosphere

name: Discolored Demo
short_description: Sozinho no meio do deserto está um restaurante à beira da estrada. Os locais dizem que perdeu toda a sua cor. Você é enviado para investigar.

name: The Anomaly Demo
short_description: The Anomaly is a deep, character focused visual novel set in modern times, combining a healthy mix of story, player choice, and mini-game elements. Your choices, victories, and failures all play a part as you build bonds with the characters around you and unlock the mystery behind Colorado Springs.

name: Nomads of the Fallen Star
short_description: A trade sim & turn-based squad-RPG set in a dynamic & living sci-fi post-apocalyptic world. Take the reigns of a rag-tag scavenger gang as they unravel the mystery of the Fallen Star.

name: ANDROMALIUS
short_description: Spending the first night in a new apartment can be quite nervewracking. New sounds, and thin walls that seperate you from others in the complex. Do you trust your new surroundings?

name: Hero Staff
short_description: HERO STAFF is a new "Old" Action Role-Playing Game inspired by classics such as Zelda, Dragon Quest and the not that old Fairune. It's a world of puzzles!

name: Border Control
short_description: Defend America from murderous zombie hordes, waves of unwashed orcs, and the military stength of enemy nations all bent on the destruction of the homeland.

name: SIMULACRA 2
short_description: Um influenciador morto. Um detetive obssessivo. Três suspeitos. Descubra a verdade, investigando as mensagens de telefone, vídeos e mídia social da vítima no acompanhamento do SIMULACRA aclamado pela crítica.

name: Yametei
short_description: This is a game about Yametei which was just discovered in the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau On January 1, 2009.It's rare,amazing and beautiful.In this game,we want to give you a cute version of this kind of mythical animal。

name: Dragon Chase
short_description: Dragon chase é um pequeno jogo híbrido entre um jogo de plataforma e um corredor onde você assume o controle de um cavaleiro sendo perseguido por um dragão. Evite ser rasgado pelo Dragão, evite armadilhas e afaste os inimigos em um ambiente aleatório.

name: Settlement Zero
short_description: Settlement Zero is a first-person VR adventure using free movement, mixing open exploration with frantic combat as you defend yourself against autonomous spacecraft and robots.

name: Hotel R'n'R
short_description: Hotel R’n’R, the gonzo VR rockstar simulator! Sell your soul to The Devil, smash up hotels and become Infamous. Pressure from hotel staff and your own limp wrists are against you, but with over 40 weapons, and a World Tour ahead of you, it’s time to get creative.

name: UNI
short_description: This consists of 40 mini-games that you can enjoy together. You can have a happy time with your friends and family. However, sometimes you may have to prepare for the destruction of friendship.

name: PARSE ALLY
short_description: The ancient system, without waiting for help, was destroyed. You are next. Yes? You and the survivors, grouped to repel the onslaught of the intruders. Of course, not all people will support you: there are those who are more interested in continuing the existing conflicts.

name: Whiskey & Zombies: The Great Southern Zombie Escape
short_description: WHISKEY & ZOMBIES is a comedy-adventure brawler/stealther set in a different kind of apocalypse where the only thing that kills the virus is moonshine whiskey. So to survive... just Drink, Fight, and Stay Alive.

name: Adventure in Kana Village-Kanji Plan
short_description: Japanese commonly used 2100 Kanji

name: Outliver: Redemption
short_description: acidente de Okoye se torna uma janela para resgatar seus valores perdidos.

name: Bus Mechanic Simulator
short_description: In the Bus Mechanic Simulator you are in the position of an experienced mechanic. In your own bus garage you can maintain, repair, test and restore various true-to-original MAN bus models. Roll up your sleeves!

name: Balloon Girl
short_description: Balloon Girl is a 2d flying platformer game where you fly through the dangerous and colorful world.

name: PacketStorm
short_description: In PacketStorm, you play an AI developing a new Internet Service Provider. Each game takes place over a few second of game-time, but potentially many hours of realtime. Buy up routers, upgrade cable networks and deal with packet jams as you earn money to research new and better upgrades.
